title: Everything you wanted to know about Rochester
body: <p>... and then some, at <a href="http://www.epodunk.com/cgi-bin/genInfo.php?locIndex=1538">ePodunk</a>. Check out this pic on their of the <a href="http://www.epodunk.com/cgi-bin/genImage.php?locId=1538&amp;imgId=ny_charlotte01.jpg&amp;cardNum=" title="not really">old fast ferry</a>. The <a href="http://www.epodunk.com/" title="wtf does epodunk mean anyways?">site</a> has all kinds of info about all kinds of places. (<a href="http://www.epodunk.com/cgi-bin/genInfo.php?locIndex=1339">even Olean</a> and <a href="http://www.epodunk.com/cgi-bin/genInfo.php?locIndex=76">Allegany</a>!)</p>
